00027 class InputActionPtr : public Linkable<InputActionPtr> 
00028 {
00029     public:
00030         InputActionPtr() : m_action(0) {}
00031         explicit InputActionPtr(InputAction * action) : m_action(action) { ASSERT(action!=0); }
00032 
00033         BOOLEAN operator == (const InputActionPtr &ptr) const { return (m_action == ptr.m_action); }
00034 
00035         InputAction * GetInputAction() { ASSERT(m_action!=0); return m_action; }
00036 
00037         BOOLEAN operator < (const InputActionPtr &ptr) const { 
00038             ASSERT(m_action!=0 && ptr.m_action!=0); 
00039             return (m_action->GetParsePriority() < ptr.m_action->GetParsePriority()); 
00040         }
00041 
00042 
00043     private:
00044         InputAction * m_action;
00045 
00046 };

00062         void RegisterInputAction(InputAction * action);

00069 class InputContext

00077                      BOOLEAN hce, BOOLEAN cse = FALSE);
00079         ~InputContext(); 
00080 
00081         BOOLEAN IsMocSetupPermitted() const { return m_mocsetuppermitted; }

00083         BOOLEAN HeldCallExists() const { return m_heldcallexists; }
00084         BOOLEAN CallInSetupExists() const { return m_callinsetupexists; }
